channel.title: Server Status
channel.description:
Hey everyone, i was wondering if anyone knows how to get server status/how many players online that i could put on my main page. I'm currently using HTML to design my custom pages. I know its a bit more work, but i have a hard time understanding php. Thanks again. I'll put an example cuz i'm not sure if it makes sense lol.
Ex: Server is (Online) with (20) players playing.
So a piece of code that says if server is online or offline and a bit of code that gets how many players online.
Once again. Thanks.

item.title: Server Status
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

Just to let you kow there been servers(called The good old times) with the same category as yours and they failed all. the reason is that poeple don’t want a boring server and slow as real rsc.

On topic i don’t know since i never looked it up, but look for it in your db or use what mapu uses for hes status page. 3hit.org/net

Read full topic
